step.description: In the resulting Add Image to Project dialog box:

section.title: To place an image on a HTML page:

step.description: In the HTML Editor select Insert > Image.
Optionally, select an image from the list of images in the project.
Optionally, click Select Image Outside Project.

Navigate to, select the image, and click Open.
